alert.note: Alert for Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 03 at 2:58PM MST until January 04 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. Blowing snow will reduce visibilities and make it difficult to keep roads open. * WHERE...Western Magic Valley zone. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
